2025-04-18: "Keep pushing forward, even when it feels like the world is against you." - Unknown
2025-04-19: "Do not be afraid to fail, for it is in failure that we learn and grow." - Michael Jordan
2025-04-20: "Believe in yourself and all that you are. You are capable of achieving greatness." - Unknown
2025-04-22: "Don't let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game." - Babe Ruth
2025-04-23: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts." - Winston Churchill
2025-04-24: "Your only limit is you. Be brave and fearless to explore the unknown." - Unknown
